Generation V.Black: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
Generation V.White: When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximum power.

Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

Generation VIII.Sword: Its psychic power can supposedly cover a range of more than half a mile—but only if its two brains can agree with each other.
Generation VIII.Shield: Its brain has split into two, and the two halves rarely think alike. Its actions are utterly unpredictable.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
Generation IX.Violet: When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximum power.
